SUMMARY

Client: CSX, Jacksonville, FL                                                                                                   Duration: May 2023 to till Date 
Role: Architect / Lead Developer 
Environment: Java 11, JMS, Spring Boot, Tomcat, Dockers, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Micro services Architecture, Event 
Driven Architecture, PCF , REST API,  AWS S3, Linux. 
 
Project Description: 
CSX is a leading supplier of rail-based freight transportation in North America. It is a Class I freight railroad 
company operating in the Eastern United States and the Canadian provinces of Ontario and Quebec. Crew Life

company operating in the Eastern United States and the Canadian provinces of Ontario and Quebec. Crew Life 
project is responsible for assigning the train crews with their duties based on their location and working hours. 
Crew Life also deals with migrating many of the existing legacy applications onto Spring Boot, dockerizing and 
deploying them onto cloud.  
 
Responsibilities: 
 Architected and implemented a micro services-based application on PCF, breaking down a monolithic 
application into modular services. 
 Migrated the Soap based services to RESTAPI using spring boot. 
 Handle customer queries and support. 
 Used Jenkins for continuous deployment and integration of the build and release process. 
 Implemented Micro-Services based Cloud Architecture using Spring Boot. 
 Resolved bugs/defects in application to assure a positive outcome using JIRA 
 Used Log4j framework to log/track application

 Resolved bugs/defects in application to assure a positive outcome using JIRA 
 Used Log4j framework to log/track application 
 Used Angular framework to create a Single Page Application which can bind data to specific 
views. 
 Developed reusable services and components using NodeJS, Spring, Angular 10 that improves the 
productivity of the development. 
 
 All   the   functionality   is   implemented   using Spring Boot   and   Hibernate   ORM.   Implemented Java EE 
components using Spring MVC, Spring IOC, spring transactions and Spring security modules.  
 Writing test cases using Junit, Mockito 
 Used Amazon Web Services (AWS) like EC2, cloud watch and Elastic Bean Stalk for code deployment. 
 Participate in agile development processes, including sprint planning, backlog grooming, and 
retrospectives. 
 Managed Docker orchestration and Docker containerization using Kubernetes 
 Ensure project goals and objectives are clearly defined, communicated, and achieved on time.

retrospectives. 
 Managed Docker orchestration and Docker containerization using Kubernetes 
 Ensure project goals and objectives are clearly defined, communicated, and achieved on time. 
 Identify and manage project risks, issues, and dependencies. 
 Work closely with project core team to define project requirements, scope, and deliverables. 
 Coordinate project activities across teams. 
 Experience with container-based deployments using Docker, working with Docker images, Docker Hub 
and Docker-registries and Kubernetes. 
 Worked with AWS Lambda to compute service to run code without provisioning or managing servers.

 Facilitate project meetings, including agenda development, meeting management, and action item 
tracking. 
 Develop and maintain software applications using Java technologies and tools. 
 Work closely with SME, project managers, and other core team members to understand project 
requirements and work on the converted to code to meet those requirements. 
 Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code that follows industry standards and best practices. 
 Troubleshoot and debug software applications, identifying and resolving defects and performance issues. 
 
Client: OPTUM (UHG)                                                                                                        Duration: July 2022 to May 2023 
Role: Architect 
Project Description: 
The "Uhcprovider Portal" is a web-based platform provided by UnitedHealth care (UHC) for healthcare providers. 
It serves as a hub where healthcare professionals can access various tools, resources, and information related to

It serves as a hub where healthcare professionals can access various tools, resources, and information related to 
their interactions with UnitedHealth care. The portal typically offers features such as claims processing, eligibility 
verification, authorization requests, provider directories, reimbursement information, and educational materials. 
It's designed to streamline administrative tasks and improve communication between providers and the insurance 
company.

containers using Kubernetes.

Client: S&P Global                                                                                                                 Duration: Aug 2020 to July2022 
Role: Lead Java Developer 
Project Description: 
Arrow   Basic   is   a   turnkey   service-based   solution   for   accessing   real-time   financial   data,   adding   company 
information,  new  fiscal  periods,  and  creating  projection  scenarios.  The  application  uses  Excel  as  a  front-end  to 
display, manipulate, and enter fiscal data while utilizing web services technology to communicate with the Oracle 
database that stores all of the data.

display, manipulate, and enter fiscal data while utilizing web services technology to communicate with the Oracle 
database that stores all of the data. 
 
Arrow Basic is currently an internal application that is globally utilized by the analytical community. The user base 
encompasses users across multiple regions and continents including North America, Europe, and Australia, Asian

and South America.  
 
Responsibilities: 
 Migrated the AB product on prem servers to AWS platform  
 Enhanced data collection  and arrow finalization project and integrated to Arrow Basic 
 Modernize  the  legacy  commodity  system  to  Serverless  architecture.  Replacing  entire  backend  business 
system on AWS. 
 Developed Reusable components Using  angular 10  
 
Client: S & P Global 
Project: Credit Scoring Tool (USPF CST)                                                                        Duration: Augest2018 to July 2020 
Role: Lead Java Developer 
Project Description: 
The  Credit  Scoring  Tool  (CST)  is designed  to allow  the  USPF  analyst  to  score and  rate  credits  within  the  General 
Obligation  (GO)  practice.  A  rating  analysis  is  cast  for  purposes  of  presenting  financial,  structural,  and  other 
information  to  a  rating  committee  into a  structured  collection.  A  Collection  is  broken  down  into  multiple  sets  of

information  to  a  rating  committee  into a  structured  collection.  A  Collection  is  broken  down  into  multiple  sets  of 
data  elements  and  data  points  for  one  or  more  entities.    These data  points  can  be  Scores,  Ratings  or  Financial 
data.  All data for an analytical review is stored in a Collection. The data from this application is used by business 
users  and  down  Stream  applications  to  forecast  the  scores  and  ratings.  Scope  of  the  project  is  development, 
migration and changes involving requirements elaboration, design, build, testing and implementation. The system 
is developed in multiple releases using the agile methodology. 
Responsibilities: 
 Migrated the CST Application  on prem servers to AWS platform  
 Supported for  production tickets  on  java services 
 
Project: Avaya Messaging Automation                                                                            Duration: May 2017 to July 2018 
Client: Aricent

Project: Avaya Messaging Automation                                                                            Duration: May 2017 to July 2018 
Client: Aricent 
Role: JAVA Tech Lead 
Description: Avaya  Messaging  Automation  provides  Enterprises  the  ability  to  efficiently  engage  with  their 
customers over social media and messaging channels. Avaya Messaging Automation will connect the business to 
relevant  social  media  and  messaging  platforms  for  monitoring  and  response  to  customer  interactions.  Avaya 
Messaging   Automation   will   analyze   interactions   providing   automation   where   possible   and   routing   other 
interactions to the appropriate agent, marketing representative, or other social media specialist for engagement. 
Through monitoring and analysis, Avaya Messaging Automation will create a rich context of the social media user 
and their conversation history for use in response and reporting. Outbound capabilities will enable the enterprise

and their conversation history for use in response and reporting. Outbound capabilities will enable the enterprise 
to produce content for proactive customer engagement. 
 
Responsibilities: 
 Design and implementation of various Java  Web Services using WSDL and XSDs 
 Deployment and testing on WAS and JBOSS server on UNIX environment 
 Developed and deployed various MicroServices using CDP platform and Jenkins pipeline 
 Developed Logging mechanism using log4j and logback 
 Worked on optimization and improved the API response time by 60% 
 Involved in writing user stories along with Product Owner 
 Support on production deployments and issues 
 Helped team to move from manual testing to automation testing to improve regression testing 
 Worked and managed team of 9+ including developers, testers and PT members

Description:Hank Washington’s paintings vibrate with color. In the summer 2016 issue of Acrylic magazine we 
shared an in-depth story about how this lifelong teacher has impacted his students’ creative lives while also 
refining his own painting techniques. Here’s another work by Washington not shown in the article, and a bit of our 
conversation with him about his masterful use of color.Budgeting and saving money do not have to be dirty words. 
Some may not like the word "budget," but if you are reading the information on this site chances are it's because 
you've gotten in over your head with spending. No credit recovery plan is complete without learning to manage 
your money. We're not talking Ebeneezer Scrooge here. Just a little mindfulness over where your money is going

your money. We're not talking Ebeneezer Scrooge here. Just a little mindfulness over where your money is going 
and how to save your money for future retirement, medical expenses, or unexpected events life may throw at you. 
Below are some articles ranging from saving for retirement, saving for unexpected medical expenses, to how to set 
up a saving’s account.

Brief Description: BSCS is Ericsson billing product. As part of Design Maintenance Team we received problem

Role: Module Owner

notifications from customers over 120 nations.Handled all Severity level problem notifications within stipulated

of various billing modules of BSCS.Any escalations are handled amicably by arranging calls and interacting with the 
clients over different nationalities.Point of contact for the client for all accounting related daily activities.

the software in case of any changes in the code. To make the communication more robust and efficient by having 
regular meetings, sync up calls with the client and updating the client with the status.

Project: Broadband Operation Support System (BBOSS)                                    Duration: March 2012 to April2014 
Client: Ericsson 
Role: Module Owner 
Brief Description: Service-On Network Manager and Service-On Element Manager both provide a number of 
North Bound Interfaces which allow them to inter-work with other higher layer OSS SLA times. or BSS systems that 
provide other functions in the overall management of a transport network. This allows the operators to integrate 
the system for operation, engineering or planning purposes. Service On north bound interfaces (named Fusion) 
are designed for ease of integration of Optical transport equipment and systems into common management 
applications. They provide integration according to the most common standards (SNMP, TCP/IP, FTP, TMF) for

applications. They provide integration according to the most common standards (SNMP, TCP/IP, FTP, TMF) for 
export interfaces to forward to upper management systems Fault and Performance, configuration and Inventory 
Data. 
 
Responsibilities: 
 Implemented  code  in  the following modules  TMF over  SO-NM (Creation  of  circuit from TMF,  Creation  of 
Path from TMF), TMF over SO-EM (improving the performance of TMF Agent during Realignment and Trail 
trace). 
 Implemented code in EM-VXX Module Which is a gateway to handle SPO1400 optical network elements 
 Involved in preparation of Basic test specification as per team requirement. 
 Involved in reviewing the code (IQA and EQA).

provides consumers and businesses with fast, reliable and convenient ways to send and receive money around the

lives a little better and meet their needs with a variety of products and services. It's just one thing that has made

lives a little better and meet their needs with a variety of products and services. It's just one thing that has made

Agent locations in more than 200 countries and territories, we have locations in the neighborhoods where our 
customers live and work.  Its a browser based application which provide the following services:
